name: Workhard
description:
Workhard - is a Shoot ‘em up side scroller about a secret agent who was assigned to liquidate a gangster group. Use different weapons to deal with a hostile gang of gangsters and get to their boss.

- Nice pixel graphics
- Ease of controls
- Shoot ‘em up made in the spirit of the old classics
- Many different levels and enemies
- Nice soundtrack
Can you get to the cruel boss of gangsters?
